articles.description: Six wins out of six and "one of the world's best keepers" returning to the starting XI - are Liverpool favourites to win the Champions League?
articles.title: Are Liverpool Champions League favourites? - Alisson 'one of world's best' - Slot

articles.description: Jhon Duran continues to make his case to be Aston Villa's starting striker with a stunning strike in their 3-2 away win over RP Leipzig in the Champions League.
articles.title: Aston Villa: Jhon Duran scores stunner to send clear message to Unai Emery

articles.description: Celtic miss an opportunity to end their seven-year wait for an away win the in the Champions League, but are "gaining confidence" at this level, says Brendan Rodgers.
articles.title: Champions League: Celtic 'gaining confidence' despite missed chance

articles.description: England flanker Tom Curry will miss Sale's Champions Cup clash with Racing 92 on Friday for a stem-cell procedure on his chronic hip condition.
articles.title: Tom Curry: England flanker has stem-cell therapy in bid to make 2027 World Cup

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe scored his 50th Champions League goal and Vinicius Jr and Jude Bellingham were also on target as Real Madrid secure a much-needed 3-2 win against Atalanta.
articles.title: Mbappe scores landmark goal as Real Madrid triumph

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Girona v Liverpool in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: UEFA Champions League LIVE: Build up to Girona v Liverpool - stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says Manchester City will be his final managerial job in club football before he "maybe" coaches a national team.
articles.title: Man City: Pep Guardiola says he is not going to manage another club team

articles.description: The Cincinnati Bengals capitalise on a late Dallas Cowboys blunder to end their three-game losing streak and win 27-20 in the NFL.
articles.title: NFL: Cincinnati Bengals capitalise on late Dallas Cowboys error to clinch late win

articles.description: Northumbria Police says a search is continuing where Tom Voyce's car was found near Alnwick.
articles.title: England rugby star Tom Voyce missing in Storm Darragh flood

articles.description: Ferrari will supply engines to the new Cadillac team if its entry is approved for the 2026 Formula 1 season.
articles.title: Ferrari to supply Cadillac F1 team with engines for 2026
